title: An Act directing the department of state police to waive the maximum age requirement for Jonathan Lewis

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Collins and Mr. Holmes of Boston, a joint petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 2583) (subject to Joint Rule 12) of Nick Collins and Russell E. Holmes for legislation to direct the department of state police to waive the maximum age requirement for Jonathan Lewis.  Public Service.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently

related_entities.name: committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Service
Hearing scheduled for 09/10/2025 from 1:00 PM-4:00 PM in A-1

Hearing rescheduled to 09/10/2025 from 01:00 PM-01:30 PM in A-1                                                                                                              and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Senate Ways and Means
